About.title: Hear About Us!
About.text: Learn about our history, our values, our vision and the objectives of our club.

Team.title: Check Our Team!
Team.text: Learn detailed information about our team members, who they are, and how to contact them.

FAQ.title: Welcome to our FAQ Page!
FAQ.text: You will find the answers to the most common questions here, check this page before asking your question!

Events.title: Check Our Events!
Events.text: Learn in detail about the location and the dates and times of our events, as well as a detailed description.
